## RectangleF.Empty property

Gets a new instance of the [`RectangleF`](../../rectanglef) structure that has [`X`](../x), [`Y`](../y), [`Width`](../width) and [`Height`](../height) values set to zero.

```csharp
public static RectangleF Empty { get; }
```
